results.title: Metformin Inhibits Transforming Growth Factor beta-Induced Fibrogenic Response of Human Dermal Fibroblasts and Suppresses Fibrosis in Keloid Spheroids.
results.text_hl: Therefore, we suggest the potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as an effective agent for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Keloid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007627 @@@keloids@@@.

results.title: Metformin Inhibits Epithelial-to-Mesenchymal Transition of Keloid Fibroblasts via the HIF-1alpha/PKM2 Signaling Pathway
